roleset.name: to place into a package
roleset.note: PACKAGE-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls 22.3-2-1. (from package.01-v)
PACKAGING-N NOTES: package.01. Corresponds to VNcls shake-22.3-2-1 (from packaging.01-n)

example.name: with Arg3
example.text: Under the agreement , Westinghouse-1 will be able [*-1] to purchase smaller combustion turbines from its Japanese partner , and package and sell them with its own generators and other equipment .
example.arg: with its own generators and other equipment

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: The company said [0] it will sell the water [*-1]plain and with lemon-lime and cherry flavors and will package it in 28-ounce bottles and 6.5 ounce bottles as part of six-packs .
example.arg: in 28-ounce bottles and 6.5 ounce bottles as part of six-packs

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: His packaging of the right mix of mechanics, supplies, and equipment allowed the supported units to receive needed logistical support under adverse conditions.
example.arg: of the right mix of mechanics, supplies, and equipment
